title: tylergross97/pdmr_data_download pipeline parameters
description: Nextflow workflow for downloading data from NCI's PDMR

input_output_options.title: Input/Output Options
input_output_options.description: Define input data and output locations for the pipeline.

samplesheet.description: Path to the samplesheet file containing PDMR sample information
samplesheet.help_text: A CSV or TSV file containing the list of PDMR samples to download. The file should contain sample identifiers and any required metadata for data retrieval.

base_dir.description: Base directory path for PDMR data location or temporary storage
base_dir.help_text: Specify the base directory where PDMR data will be accessed or temporarily stored during the download process.

outdir.description: The output directory where downloaded PDMR data will be saved
outdir.help_text: All downloaded files and pipeline results will be saved to this directory. Use absolute paths when working with cloud infrastructure.
